game.name: Skart's FunZone
game.shortDescription: Experience this terrifying journey back in time at Skart's FunZone. The game combines the charm of Rubber Hose's animation, inspired by classic 1930s cartoons, with the immersive horror experience of being inside those films.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Experience this terrifying journey back in time at Skart's FunZone. The game combines the charm of Rubber Hose's animation, inspired by classic 1930s cartoons, with the immersive horror experience of being inside those films.
